attributes.action: remove the motoring illegals and leave the law abiding alone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If this government are serious about cutting the amount of traffic congestion on this countries roads maybe the place to start is as follows. Recent figures suggested there could be as many as several million untaxed vehicles on the road - possibly up to 10% of all traffic. As all these vehicles are using the roads illegally a concerted effort to remove them would free up a lot of space for those of us who play by the rules. Who knows it could even lead to sensible priced insurance premiums as we no longer have to pay for the uninsured as well.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
